sections.text:
79-878.Student teacher or intern; terms, defined.

Whenever in sections 79-875 to 79-878 board of education is referred to and the school that a student teacher or intern is referred to does not have a board of education, such term shall be the person or governing body that administers such school.

SourceLaws 1971, LB 175, ยง 4;R.S.1943, (1994), ยง 79-12,100;Laws 1996, LB 900, ยง 503.
